title: Learning Never Stops for Top AI Talent – Join Oracle’s Race to Certification Today
text: The job market continues to be competitive and the pace of change, particularly with AI, means that continuous learning is a necessity. The skills development and certification opportunities offered by the Race to Certification can demonstrate that you have the skills and expertise required to work with Oracle technologies. Join the 440,000 people (and counting!) who have accessed sought-after digital training and certifications in AI, for FREE.
